        boolean isStarted()
        Returns:
        True if a quiz has been started. False otherwise

      • isCompleted

        boolean isCompleted()
        Returns:
        True if the last question has been answer, false otherwise.

      • hasNextQuestion

        boolean hasNextQuestion()
        Returns:
        true if there is a question after the current one, false otherwise.

      • getNextQuestion

        IQuestion getNextQuestion()
        Sets isCompleted to false if there are no more questions after returning;
        Returns:
        the next question that should be answered.

      • getCurrentQuestion

        IQuestion getCurrentQuestion()
        sets the isStarted variable to true if it is false and returns the current question
        Returns:
        the current question waiting for an answer.

      • getCurrentAnswer

        java.lang.String getCurrentAnswer()
        Returns:
        the answer to the current question

      • checkAnswer

        boolean checkAnswer(java.lang.String answer)
        checks if the user input matches the question's answer.
        Parameters:
        answer - the user input as a string
        Returns:
        true if the answer matches, false otherwise.

      • reset

        void reset()
        Resets the number of incorrect answers and the current question to 0, isStarted and isCompleted to false;

      • getQuestionNumber

        int getQuestionNumber()
        Returns:
        the number of the current question
